name: DEREZ
description:
DEREZ is a four-player platform fighter about throwing discs, breaking blocks, and launching your foes offscreen.

Inspired by Super Smash Bros, Frog Smashers and Tron: Legacy

Controls:
 Keyboard
  Movement - Arrow Keys
  Jump - Z
  Throw / Catch Disc - X

 Xbox Controller
  Movement - Left Stick
  Jump - A
  Throw / Catch Disc - X

Feel free to check out my other stuff!
 https://twitter.com/StriderToll
 https://stridertoll.itch.io/
